001/*
002javac -cp ".;junit-4.12.jar" PrintTest.java
003
004java -cp ".;hamcrest-core-1.3.jar;junit-4.12.jar" \
005     org.junit.runner.JUnitCore \
006     PrintTest
007*/
008
009import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
010import static org.junit.Assert.assertNotEquals;
011import org.junit.Test;
012import org.junit.Ignore;
013import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
014import org.junit.runners.JUnit4;
015
016/**
017* Testing the SlotGameTest class
018* 
019* @author      Pavithra Subramaniyam; pavithra.subramaniyam@tuni.fi;             
020*                        
021*/
022@RunWith(JUnit4.class)
023public class SlotGameTest {
024
025    /**
026    * This test to verify whether the string out is correct or incorrect 
027    * <p> AssertEquals method has been used                      
028    */
029    @Test
030    public void WinningConditionTest(){
031        int a = 2;
032        int b = 3;
033        int c = 2;
034        SlotGame obj = new SlotGame();
035        assertEquals(obj.FruitName(a,b,c),"Congratulations, you have won 50$");
036    }
037
038    /**
039    * This condition is to check for the highest winning condition
040    * <p> AssertEquals method has been used                      
041    */
042    @Test
043    public void BarConditionTest(){
044        int a = 6;
045        int b = 6;
046        int c = 6;
047        SlotGame obj = new SlotGame();
048        assertEquals(obj.FruitName(a,b,c),"Congratulations,You have won $100");
049    }
050
051    /**
052    * This condition is same as first condition but numbers have been changed
053    * <p> AssertEquals method has been used                      
054    */
055    @Test
056    public void DifferentNumConditionTest(){
057        int a = 1;
058        int b = 2;
059        int c = 3;
060        SlotGame obj = new SlotGame();
061        assertEquals(obj.FruitName(a,b,c),"No matches found");
062    }
063
064    /**
065    * actual and expected values are not equal 
066    * <p> AssertNotEquals method has been used                      
067    */
068    @Test
069    public void NotEqualConditionTest(){
070        int a = 1;
071        int b = 1;
072        int c = 1;
073        SlotGame obj = new SlotGame();
074        assertNotEquals(obj.FruitName(a,b,c),"No matches found");
075    }
076}
